title: Slash Commands
noSearchResults: No commands found matching your search.
selectCommand: Select a command to view details

useguide.title: How to Use This Command
useguide.basicUsageDesc: In Claude Code, enter the following command to execute:
useguide.userLevelDesc: This command is globally available in all projects
useguide.projectLevelDesc: This command is only available in the current project
useguide.step1: Enter the command in Claude Code's chat interface
useguide.step2: The command will automatically expand and execute its defined instructions
useguide.step3: Claude will complete the corresponding tasks according to the command's instructions
useguide.step4: Review the execution results and perform follow-up operations as needed
useguide.editCommandDesc: To modify this command, you can directly edit the following file:
useguide.tip2: Command names typically use lowercase letters and hyphens
useguide.tip3: You can configure allowed-tools in the command file's frontmatter to restrict which tools Claude can use
useguide.tip4: Command instructions support Markdown format and dynamic execution syntax !`command`

dialog.createDescription: Create a new slash command for Claude Code
dialog.editDescription: Modify the command settings and instructions
dialog.name: Command Name
dialog.nameHint: The command will be invoked as
dialog.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this command does
dialog.projectPathHint: The command will be saved to
dialog.instructionsPlaceholder: Enter the instructions for Claude when this command is invoked...
dialog.instructionsHint: These instructions will be sent to Claude when the command is executed. You can use Markdown formatting and dynamic syntax like !`command`.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command? This action cannot be undone.

errors.invalidName: Command name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens, and must start with a letter
errors.duplicateFrontmatter: Instructions should not contain frontmatter (---). The description will be automatically added as frontmatter.
errors.invalidFrontmatter: Invalid frontmatter format detected. Please remove the frontmatter block (--- ... ---) from instructions.
errors.missingDescription: Command file must contain a description field in frontmatter

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.fixErrors: Please fix the following errors before saving:
